title: Paths of Glory
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: The conduit was roughly a meter and a half in diameter and pitch dark. He had expected that and had extracted a waterproof flashlight from an emergency kit in the wreckage of the Hind. It was helping, but not all that much. With the heat exchangers off, no water was flowing. The stone walls were merely moist, the curved sides covered with slime.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
